cleaned_text: The Activator Method® is one of the most widely [researched ](https://www.activator.com/research/)chiropractic techniques and the only instrument adjusting technique with clinical trials to support its efficacy. The Activator Method protocol is a systematic, scientific process of testing the articulations of the spine and skeleton to determine the exact location of spinal dysfunction. The Activator Method adjusting protocol utilizes a handheld spring powered device that applies a precise force in an extremely accurate and safe manner. There is no twisting, popping or cracking involved in this protocol. For more information on this approach to adjusting the spine visit the [Activator Methods](https://www.activator.com/) website
